creator: cond1pet@police.nsw.gov.au
text:
the following code produces about 100 less files than anticipated.

<target name='zip'>
    <tstamp/>
    <zip includes="**/*" destfile="c:\vsswork/backup/${DSTAMP} ${TSTAMP} 
intrak.zip" basedir="c:\vsswork/intrak" defaultexcludes="no" excludes=""/>
</target>

all the missing files match the default exclude list, but it's turned off.

do you know about this task :
http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/defaultexcludes.html
creator: antoine@apache.org
cond1pet@police.nsw.gov.au
text:
that will probabily fix the problem, but I still think that the zip task has a 
bug.

I think a better workaround would be using nested <fileset>s with 
defaultexcludes="false".

But I agree with Peter :-)
creator: jan@materne.de

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18637 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
